dialogue.text: You sounded great during rehersal!
How are you feeling?
...like I can't breathe...
...[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]like I'm going to throw up[/shake]...
...[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=1]like I shouldn't be here[/shake]...
Yeah, I had a feeling you might be struggling.
Why don't you practice some box-breathing?
Thanks, Guy.
Oh, here comes the rest of the band!
Your performance earlier was inspiring.
Your voice was as powerful as a waterfall!
Falla Finita!...Always with the waterfalls...
But he is right
There is not a doubt in my mind that we will succeed.
Boss already has his eye on you
This should provide us a distinct advantage!
I don't know about an advantage...
Don't you lose your fire now!
We are in this together!
But speak of the devil...
